# Changelog

All notable changes to `personal-data-export` will be documented in this file

## 1.3.0 - 2020-03-03

- support Laravel 7

## 1.2.0 - 2019-09-05

- support Laravel 6

## 1.1.1 - 2019-07-01

- format exported JSON

## 1.1.0 - 2019-06-15

- made API fluent
- readme corrections

## 1.0.4 - 2019-06-03

- add uuid compatibility

## 1.0.3 - 2019-05-28

- fix issue where using files using with disk parameter was not included in final zip

## 1.0.2 - 2019-05-08

- fix #11

## 1.0.1 - 2019-03-18

- make properties of events public

## 1.0.0 - 2019-03-11

- initial release
